title: Redesign UI with new color scheme and icons

requirements.summary: Update the color scheme to match the reference site, replacing the current teal/cyan/blue water jet theme with the new color palette
acceptanceCriteria: All primary, secondary, and accent colors are updated throughout the application
Color variables in frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css are modified to reflect the new palette
Glassmorphism effects and gradients use the new color scheme
Button colors, backgrounds, and text colors are consistent with the new design

file_operations.description: Update CSS custom properties for the color scheme. Replace the current water jet brand colors (teal/cyan/blue defined in --primary, --secondary, --accent, --muted, --card, --popover variables) with the new color palette from the reference site. Update both light and dark theme color values in the :root and .dark selectors. Modify glassmorphism effect colors in .glass-panel and .glass-effect classes to use the new palette. Ensure gradient colors in utility classes are updated to match the new scheme.

Update global Tailwind CSS color variables defined using OKLCH color system. Modify design tokens for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component colors in both light and dark theme sections to align with the new color palette from the reference site. Ensure consistency between this file and frontend/src/index.css.

Update gradient overlay colors and floating decorative blob colors to match the new color scheme. Modify the gradient classes on the overlay divs and the background colors of the floating-blob elements. Update glass-panel styling to use new color variables. Ensure button colors (primary and secondary CTAs) reflect the new palette.

Update service card background colors, border colors, and icon colors to match the new color scheme. Modify glassmorphism effects and hover state colors on service cards to use the new palette. Ensure text colors maintain proper contrast with the new backgrounds.

Update section background gradients, card colors, and IconBadge color variants to match the new color scheme. Modify the promotional discount text styling and CTA button colors to use the new palette. Update glassmorphism effects on feature badges.

Update benefit card background colors, glassmorphism effects, and icon colors to match the new color scheme. Modify gradient backgrounds and CTA button colors to use the new palette. Ensure the two-column layout maintains visual consistency with the updated colors.

Update form input colors, button colors, and glassmorphism panel styling to match the new color scheme. Modify border colors, focus states, and hover effects to use the new palette. Ensure form accessibility is maintained with proper contrast ratios.
Update glassmorphism panel background colors, text colors, and icon colors to match the new color scheme. Modify border and shadow effects to align with the new palette.
Update button background colors, hover state colors, and glassmorphism effects to match the new color scheme. Ensure the floating button remains visually prominent while using the new palette.

Update navigation bar background colors, text colors, and 'Book Now' button colors to match the new color scheme. Modify glassmorphism effects on the sticky navigation to use the new palette. Ensure language selector styling aligns with the new design.
Update footer background colors, text colors, CTA button colors, and link colors to match the new color scheme. Modify any gradient or glassmorphism effects to use the new palette.
Update grid card background colors, icon colors, and text colors to match the new color scheme. Modify glassmorphism effects and hover states to use the new palette.
Update service area card background colors, glassmorphism effects, and icon colors to match the new color scheme. Modify border colors and hover states to use the new palette.

Update gradient backgrounds for both primary and orange variants to match the new color scheme. Modify hover animation colors and ensure the component variants align with the new palette throughout the application.

requirements.summary: Replace all Font Awesome icons throughout the application with new icons that match the design style of the reference site
acceptanceCriteria: Icons in ServicesSection, CoverageSection, ServiceAreasSection, SofaCleaningSection, and WaterJetFoamSection are replaced
IconBadge component uses new icon assets or icon library
Navigation and footer icons are updated
All icons maintain consistent visual style and sizing

file_operations.description: Replace Font Awesome icons for the four core AC services (water jet, water jet foam, repairing, installation) with new icon assets or alternative icon library components that match the reference site design style. Ensure icon sizing and positioning remain consistent. Update import statements to reflect the new icon source.

Replace Font Awesome icons used in the coverage information display with new icon assets or alternative icon library components. Ensure icons maintain the same semantic meaning and visual prominence as the originals while matching the reference site style.

Replace Font Awesome map marker icons in the service areas grid with new icon assets or alternative icon library components that match the reference site design. Update all icon references throughout the three-column grid layout.

Replace icons used in the four feature badges with new icon assets or alternative icon library components. Update the IconBadge usage to pass new icon components or asset references. Ensure feature badge icons (representing benefits like deep cleaning, protection, eco-friendly, efficiency) maintain semantic clarity with the new icon style.

Replace icons in the four benefit cards (deep cleaning, protection, eco-friendly, efficiency) with new icon assets or alternative icon library components. Ensure the two-column layout maintains visual balance with the new icon style and sizing.

Update the IconBadge component to accept and render new icon assets or alternative icon library components instead of Font Awesome icons. Modify the component's icon prop handling and rendering logic to support the new icon system. Ensure size variants and hover animations work correctly with the new icons.
Replace any navigation icons with new icon assets or alternative icon library components. If the logo or language selector uses icon elements, update them to match the reference site design style.

Replace footer icons (service van icon, any social or contact icons) with new icon assets or alternative icon library components. Ensure the footer maintains visual consistency with the new icon style throughout.

Replace icons in the four local service phrases grid with new icon assets or alternative icon library components. Ensure icons maintain semantic relevance to the phrases they accompany while matching the reference site style.
Replace the WhatsApp icon with a new icon asset or alternative icon library component that matches the reference site design. Ensure the floating button remains visually recognizable and accessible.

requirements.summary: Update the overall layout and design structure to match the reference site's visual hierarchy and component arrangement
acceptanceCriteria: Section spacing, padding, and margins match the reference design
Typography hierarchy (font sizes, weights, line heights) is updated
Card layouts and component styling follow the reference site patterns
Responsive behavior matches the reference site across device sizes

file_operations.description: Update typography hierarchy by modifying base font sizes, line heights, and font weights to match the reference site. Adjust spacing utilities and add any custom utility classes needed for the new layout patterns. Update container max-widths and responsive breakpoint behaviors if needed to match the reference design.

Update Tailwind configuration to match the reference site's design system. Modify font size scale, spacing scale, border radius values, and container settings. Adjust responsive breakpoints if the reference site uses different viewport handling. Ensure custom shadows and other theme extensions align with the reference design patterns.

Update section spacing and vertical rhythm between components to match the reference site. Adjust padding, margins, and gap values for the overall page layout. Modify the gradient background implementation if the reference site uses different background patterns. Ensure the order and arrangement of sections match the reference visual hierarchy.

Update hero section layout structure, spacing, and positioning to match the reference site. Modify heading font sizes, tagline styling, and CTA button sizing and placement. Adjust floating decorative blob positioning and animation timing if the reference site uses different decorative patterns. Update vertical padding and content centering to match the reference hierarchy.

Update service card layout, spacing, and grid structure to match the reference site. Modify card padding, heading sizes, description text sizing, and icon positioning. Adjust responsive grid behavior (columns at different breakpoints) to match the reference design. Update card height, aspect ratio, or content alignment as needed.

Update section layout structure, spacing between elements, and typography hierarchy to match the reference site. Modify heading sizes, feature badge arrangement, pricing display styling, and CTA button sizing. Adjust padding and margins to align with the reference visual hierarchy.

Update two-column layout proportions, spacing, and responsive behavior to match the reference site. Modify heading sizes, benefit card layout, and image positioning. Adjust grid gaps, padding, and alignment to align with the reference design structure.

Update form layout, input sizing, spacing, and button placement to match the reference site. Modify label typography, input field heights, and form padding. Adjust responsive behavior and form width at different breakpoints to align with the reference design patterns.
Update section padding, text sizing, and panel layout to match the reference site. Modify heading hierarchy and paragraph spacing to align with the reference typography system.

Update grid layout, card spacing, and responsive column behavior to match the reference site. Modify card padding, text sizing, and icon positioning. Adjust grid gaps and card heights to align with the reference design structure.

Update grid layout, card sizing, and spacing to match the reference site. Modify text hierarchy and icon positioning within cards. Adjust responsive behavior to align with the reference design patterns.

Update gallery grid layout, image aspect ratios, and spacing to match the reference site. Modify hover effects, card styling, and responsive column behavior. Adjust gap sizes and image container styling to align with the reference design structure.

Update navigation bar height, padding, and layout structure to match the reference site. Modify logo sizing, button dimensions, and spacing between navigation elements. Adjust sticky behavior and responsive layout to align with the reference design.

Update footer layout structure, padding, and spacing to match the reference site. Modify text sizing, button placement, and content arrangement. Adjust vertical and horizontal spacing to align with the reference design hierarchy.

requirements.summary: Update gradient backgrounds, glassmorphism effects, and visual decorations to align with the reference site aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section background and overlays match reference styling
Glass panel effects are updated with new colors and opacity values
Floating decorative elements match the reference design
Hover states and animations are consistent with the new theme

file_operations.description: Update glassmorphism utility classes (.glass-panel, .glass-effect) with new backdrop-blur values, opacity levels, and border styling to match the reference site aesthetic. Modify gradient utility classes to use the new color palette and gradient directions from the reference design. Adjust animation keyframes and timing functions if the reference site uses different animation patterns.

Update hero section gradient overlays by modifying gradient direction, color stops, and opacity values to match the reference site. Update floating decorative blob styling including blur effects, opacity, colors, and positioning. Modify glass-panel effects on the content container to match the reference aesthetic. Adjust animation timings and transforms for floating elements if the reference site uses different animation patterns.

Update glassmorphism effects on service cards by modifying backdrop-blur, background opacity, and border styling to match the reference site. Update hover state transitions, shadow effects, and transform animations to align with the reference design aesthetic. Modify gradient accents or decorative elements if present in the reference design.

Update glassmorphism effects on feature badges and section panels to match the reference site aesthetic. Modify backdrop-blur, opacity, and border styling. Update hover state animations and shadow effects to align with the reference design. Adjust gradient backgrounds or decorative elements as needed.

Update glassmorphism effects on benefit cards by modifying backdrop-blur, background opacity, and border styling to match the reference site. Update hover state transitions and shadow effects. Adjust any gradient backgrounds or decorative overlays to align with the reference aesthetic.

Update glassmorphism effects on the form panel by modifying backdrop-blur, opacity, and border styling to match the reference site. Update input focus states, button hover effects, and any gradient accents to align with the reference design aesthetic.
Update glassmorphism panel effects by modifying backdrop-blur, background opacity, and border styling to match the reference site aesthetic. Adjust shadow effects and hover states as needed.

Update glassmorphism card effects by modifying backdrop-blur, opacity, and border styling to match the reference site. Update hover state transitions and shadow effects to align with the reference design aesthetic.

Update glassmorphism styling on the floating button by modifying backdrop-blur, background opacity, and border effects to match the reference site. Update hover state animations, shadow effects, and any pulse or glow effects to align with the reference aesthetic.

Update glassmorphism effects on the sticky navigation bar by modifying backdrop-blur, background opacity, and border styling to match the reference site. Update scroll-triggered styling changes and shadow effects to align with the reference design aesthetic.

Update overall page gradient background by modifying gradient colors, directions, and opacity values to match the reference site aesthetic. Adjust any page-level decorative elements or overlay effects to align with the reference design.
